title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message:
Please find attached picture , there are moving stripes vertically and horizontally on the screen.
I have replaced the motherboard and display LVDS cable , still the issue exist, it's not always but sometimes. 
The last thing remaining to change is the full display, do you guys think it's because of display?

title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message:
Check external video first.

BTW, no attached picture found...

title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message: External monitor works without any problem. If the conclusion is problem with display then what it would be ? Other than the LVDS cable

title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message: That looks like display problem, not video cable.

title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message: There is no sign of a hit /dent on the display. Is it something I can remove the display LCD panel and fix it internally ??? I have a 0.1mm ultra-thin opening card, Will it help if I open the display panel? What problem it would be if there is no Hit on the display?

title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message: Why don't you test with compatible screen and see what happens?

title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message:
I agree that the new display will work. But I don't want to discard the existing display if there is an option to repair it

Br
Manu

title: A502 - 2014 display moving stripes
message: Bad contacts on the galss surface, or bad display electronics.
